Package cr.ac.itcr.examproject

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AboutFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFragment
    Fragment to show About app information
    BuildConfig  
    DoubleSelectionFragment
    DoubleSelectionFragment to show DoubleSelection info
    ExamDetailFragment
    Fragment ot show detail of exam Show the detail of an exam.
    ExamListFragment
    Fragment that lists the exams
    ExamManagementDrawer
    Navigation Drawer activity, the father of all fragments
    MainActivity
    MainActivity is the first page shown, used to give a first view to the user before entering the management of exams This class extends Activity and it will, upon a button click, call the next view necesary for the management of exams
    NewDoubleSelection
    Fragment to create a new Double Selection question
    NewExam
    Fragment to create new exam
    NewQuestion
    Fragment to create a new question
    NewSection
    Fragment to create new section
    NewSingleSelection
    Fragment to create a new Single Selection question
    NewTrueFalse
    Fragment to create a new True False Question
    QuestionListFragment
    Fragment to cshow question list
    R

    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    RealizeExam
    Activity for evaluating and exam This activity is used to go through the list sections of an exam and show the questions.
    SectionDetailFragment
    Fragment to show section detail
    SectionsListFragment
    Fragment to show section list
    SingleSelectionFragment
    Fragment to show SingleSelectionFragment
    TrueFalseFragment
    Fragment to show true false question
